snippet: The Beinecke Rare Book & Manuscript Library at Yale has acquired the papers of the writer and gardener Vita Sackville-West and her husband, Harold Nicolson.
abstract: Beinecke Rare Book & Manuscript Library at Yale acquires papers of writer and gardener Vita Sackville-West and her husband Harold Nicolson; couple featured prominently in Britain’s literary and political life in first half of 20th century.
lead_paragraph: The Beinecke Rare Book & Manuscript Library at Yale has acquired the papers of the writer and gardener Vita Sackville-West and her husband, Harold Nicolson.
